abstract: Bookstores across United States are celebrating publication of script for play Harry Potter and the Cursed Child; play, while based on works by Harry Potter author J K Rowling, is written by Jack Thorne and conceived by Thorne and director John Tiffany, raising question of whether it qualifies as true Harry Potter story, and whether fans care.
lead_paragraph: Even though J.K. Rowling isn’t the author of this play, Scholastic’s midnight release of the script as a book is expected to draw thousands to stores this weekend.

headline.main: ‘Harry Potter and the Cursed Child’ Goes From Stage to Page on Saturday at the Witching Hour
headline.print_headline: Stage to Page:  Harry Potter, With a Twist

snippet: Even though J.K. Rowling isn’t the author of this play, Scholastic’s midnight release of the script as a book is expected to draw thousands to stores this weekend....
